name: metadata
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool cryptocurrency_financial_data.
Tool description: All endpoints are available in the free tier! Cryptocurrency financial data API for major exchanges. Candlesticks (OHLCV, VWAP, and Trade Count), Trades (tick-level). Spot and futures markets. Robust data catalog and documentation.
API description: Fetches the metadata information for cryptocurrency markets from the specified API.

asset_type.description: The type of the asset, e.g., 'spot' or 'futures'. Default is 'spot'.

market_venue.description: The trading venue where the asset is listed, e.g., 'BINANCE'. Default is 'BINANCE'.

symbol.description: The symbol of the cryptocurrency, e.g., 'BTC'. Default is 'BTC'.

base.description: The base currency for trading, e.g., 'USDT'. Default is 'USDT'.

data_type.description: The type of data to fetch, e.g., 'metrics'. Default is 'metrics'.
